==== index.js (10 errors) ====
    /**
     * 
     * @param {number} num 
               ~~~~~~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
     */
    function acceptNum(num) {}

     * @typedef {(a: string, b: number) => void} Fn
                    ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
                               ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
     */
    
    /** @type {Fn} */
               ~~

    const fn1 =
